title: Pegasus case: France’s Emmanuel Macron among heads of state on snoop list
content:
1. Pegasus case: France’s Emmanuel Macron among heads of state on snoop list  The Indian Express
  2. Mexico Used Private Israeli Spyware Pegasus to Surveil President's Family & a Murdered Journalist  Democracy Now!
  3. Edward Snowden on spyware: 'This is an industry that should not exist'  The Guardian
  4. Pegasus Project: Why I was targeted by Israeli spyware  Middle East Eye
  5. Opinion | Spyware is thriving, dangerous and unrestrained. It's time to change that.  The Washington Post
